backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing brand and creator submissions with functions to submit, query by email, and fetch all submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented marketing features, their files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend marketing component and utility file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout composing header, hero, marketing sections, lead capture, contact section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section with email and WhatsApp actions plus response‑time and working‑hours cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqSec: FAQ section displaying brand and creator questions using accordion components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/forms/: Brand lead capture form with validation, state management, and submission via useLeadSubmission.
Creator lead capture form handling validation, field states, and submission through useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Hero section with background image, headline, and CTA buttons that smooth‑scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Inline: Component showing field‑level validation errors with an icon.
frontend/src/components/marketing/LeadCa: Renders a tabbed interface allowing users to choose between brand and creator lead forms. Manages active tab state and displays the appropriate form.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Displays a multi-step process timeline with icons, descriptions, and durations. Includes an additional card outlining required information for applicants.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Aggregates major marketing sections including how-it-works steps for brands and creators and imports additional subsections. Provides structured content blocks with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows detailed service offerings for brands and creators using cards with icons and descriptions. Divides content into two columns for each audience type.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Renders the site footer with navigation shortcuts, contact info, and branding. Includes smooth-scroll behavior for section links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Implements a sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation, smooth scrolling, and a toggleable mobile menu sheet. Displays brand logo linking to the top of the page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Displays testimonial cards and key stats as social proof. Includes quotes, ratings, roles, and summary metrics.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Submis: Shows success or error alerts after form submission. Adjusts messaging based on submission state and application type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Hook exposing brand and creator submission methods with loading, success, and error state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/formOptions.ts: Static option lists for budget ranges, timelines, platforms, and audience sizes.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Simple required-field and email-format validation helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for the Koda D website, outlining its purpose, architecture notes, features, and requirements. Contains versioning, existing features, and no known issues.
